comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b9pre) Gecko/20110101 Firefox/4.0b9pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b9pre) Gecko/20110101 Firefox/4.0b9pre

When tab modal prompt is displayed Ctrl-F works always ("find on page" dialog is activated), but / sometimes doesn't work

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. type javascript:alert('test') in url bar and press enter
2. press Ctrl-F - "find on page" appears
3. press Esc
4. press / - nothing happens
5. press Ctrl-F - "find on page" appears

Actual Results:  
After pressing Esc pressing / doesn't activate "find on page" dialog, but Ctrl-F does

Expected Results:  
Pressing both / and Ctrl-F should activate "find on page" dialog

Fixing or not of this bug depends on bug 622949. If bug 622949 will be marked as invalid then this bug should be fixed, but if 622949 is going to be fixed then this one should be marked as invalid
